con:xmlEntry.con:xml-content: <?xml version = '1.0' encoding = 'UTF-8'?> <!DOCTYPE properties SYSTEM "http://java.sun.com/dtd/properties.dtd"> <properties> <entry key="PRODUCT.GENERIC:db_column_not_null">true</entry> <entry key="PRODUCT.ID:db_column_size">20</entry> <entry key="PRODUCT.PRICE:db_column_type">NUMBER</entry> <entry key="PRODUCT.ACTIVE_COMPONENT:db_column_not_null">true</entry> <entry key="PRODUCT.PRICE:db_column_precision">0</entry> <entry key="PRODUCT.ACTIVE_COMPONENT:db_column_size">20</entry> <entry key="PRODUCT.ID:db_column_not_null">true</entry> <entry key="PRODUCT.GENERIC:db_column_type">NUMBER</entry> <entry key="PRODUCT.NAME:db_column_type">VARCHAR2</entry> <entry key="PRODUCT.PRICE:db_column_not_null">true</entry> <entry key="PRODUCT.NAME:db_column_not_null">true</entry> <entry key="PRODUCT.PRESENTATION:db_column_type">VARCHAR2</entry> <entry key="return_single_result_set">false</entry> <entry key="PRODUCT.ID:db_column_type">VARCHAR2</entry> <entry key="PRODUCT.NAME:db_column_size">20</entry> <entry key="PRODUCT.PRESENTATION:db_column_not_null">false</entry> <entry key="PRODUCT:db_table_type">TABLE</entry> <entry key="root_descriptor_alias">PRODUCT</entry> <entry key="PRODUCT:db_column_5">PRESENTATION</entry> <entry key="PRODUCT.ACTIVE_COMPONENT:db_column_type">VARCHAR2</entry> <entry key="PRODUCT:db_column_4">ID</entry> <entry key="PRODUCT:db_column_3">ACTIVE_COMPONENT</entry> <entry key="PRODUCT:db_column_2">GENERIC</entry> <entry key="PRODUCT:db_column_1">PRICE</entry> <entry key="PRODUCT:db_column_0">NAME</entry> <entry key="PRODUCT.PRESENTATION:db_column_size">200</entry> <entry key="PRODUCT.GENERIC:db_column_precision">0</entry> </properties>
